name: Classroom Battle: Students vs Teachers Showdown!
name_original: Classroom Battle: Students vs Teachers Showdown!
description:
The School Battle Game is Now in the App Store!

Choose your character and battle the Teachers. As the last remaining student willing to stand up to authority, it is up to you to defeat the the dictators and earn the chance to RULE the SCHOOL!

* Choose your weapons, select your armor and get get ready for battle.
* Visit the training centre to earn coins
* Change your tactics depending on which way the wind is blowing
* Beat your opponents and move up the ranks

PRO TIPS
- Visit the store to choose your weapons and kit
- Use a finger swipe to attack your opponents
- Switch between different weapons
